skill.name: grammar-and-style-enhancer
skill.description: Improves text quality by enhancing grammar, vocabulary, narrative clarity, flow, pacing, and writing style while preserving the author’s voice.
skill.summary: Improves text quality by enhancing grammar, vocabulary, narrative clarity, flow, pacing, and writing...
skill.author: Amraha-Anwar

security_audit.summary: This is a pure prompt-based skill containing only markdown instructions. No executable code, scripts, network calls, file system access, or external command execution. The skill operates solely on text input provided by users during conversation.

content.value_statement: Writers often struggle with grammar, word choice, and pacing. This skill analyzes text across multiple dimensions including grammar, sentence structure, vocabulary, flow, and narrative pacing to improve quality while preserving the author's unique voice.
actual_capabilities: Enhances word choice and reduces repetition
Adjusts pacing and rhythm in fiction
Preserves author voice and narrative intent
limitations: Cannot access or edit external files directly
Does not provide citations or fact-checking
Limited to text provided in the conversation

use_cases.title: Polish Blog Posts
use_cases.description: Improve clarity and engagement in articles while maintaining your unique writing voice.

use_cases.title: Refine Fiction Prose
use_cases.description: Enhance dialogue naturalness, pacing, and emotional tone without altering character voice.

use_cases.title: Strengthen Business Writing
use_cases.description: Make emails, reports, and documents more professional and impactful.

prompt_templates.title: Basic Grammar Check
prompt_templates.prompt: Fix the grammar and punctuation in this text: [paste your text here]

prompt_templates.title: Style Enhancement
prompt_templates.prompt: Enhance this text for better flow and readability. Keep the meaning intact: [paste your text here]

prompt_templates.title: Fiction Rewrite
prompt_templates.prompt: Rewrite this fiction passage to improve pacing and emotional impact. Maintain the character voice: [paste your passage here]

prompt_templates.title: Full Multi-Layer Edit
prompt_templates.prompt: Perform a complete multi-layer edit on this text. Improve grammar, word choice, flow, and cohesion. Provide the improved version, change summary, and suggestions: [paste your text here]

output_examples.input: The weather was realy nice so we went to the park. We had fun and eat lunch. The day was good.
output: Improved version: The weather was really nice, so we went to the park. We had fun and ate lunch. It was a lovely day.
Changes: Fixed 'realy' to 'really', added comma after 'nice', changed 'eat' to 'ate', expanded final sentence for better flow
Suggestions: Consider adding sensory details about the park, vary sentence length for rhythm, add specific activities you enjoyed

best_practices: Provide the full context when sharing multiple paragraphs for cohesive editing
Specify your preferred tone so the skill can match your voice appropriately
Review suggested changes and accept only what enhances your original intent
anti_patterns: Expecting the skill to fact-check or verify external information
Using for legal, medical, or technical documents requiring expert review
Providing extremely long texts without breaking them into sections

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. Use it in any conversation with these tools.

faq.question: What is the text length limit?
faq.answer: The skill handles typical paragraph to essay-length texts. Very long works should be divided into sections.

faq.question: Does it integrate with other tools?
faq.answer: The skill operates within your AI conversation. No external integrations are needed or supported.

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: The skill only processes text you provide during the conversation. No data is stored or transmitted externally.

faq.question: Why were my changes rejected?
faq.answer: The skill may preserve certain phrases if they are integral to your voice. Review suggestions and adjust prompts to override.

faq.question: How is this different from other editors?
faq.answer: Unlike spellcheckers, this skill analyzes multiple dimensions including flow, pacing, and narrative voice simultaneously.
